item.description:
Travel Photography Evening Workshop – Tuesday, August 17, 2010, 6:30-9:30 PM

Title: Travel Photography Workshop – How to take Better Pictures on your Next Trip

Workshop Fee: $45.00

Where: Damianos Photography Studio, 59 Fountain Street, 4th Floor East #10, Framingham MA 01702

Registration: Register by calling Nicole at 508.873.6387 or email Nicole@NicoleConnolly.com

Description: If you are like most passionate travelers, you want to bring back vacation pictures that you can enjoy and share with your family and friends upon your return. How do you go about getting those stellar vacation shots though? How can you improve your travel photography? How can you easily share your pictures with your friends? Professional travel photographer Nicole Connolly will take you on an inspiring journey and reveal how you can take memorable pictures on your own trips, no matter what type of camera equipment you own or the level of experience you have. Topics will include creative lighting techniques, noticing and capturing the essence of a place, and taking your camera equipment to another level.

Nicole was born and raised in Southern Germany and is a graduate of BU's Center for Digital Imaging Arts. She has worked as a freelance travel photographer for the past two years, visiting Iceland, Denmark, Hungary, and Italy. Hmm, I wonder what country she will visit next?

What to Bring to your First Class?

The camera equipment you intend to take on your next trip.
1-2 pictures from your last trip to share with the class (email JPEGs to Nicole@NicoleConnolly.com by 8/15/10 or bring your prints)
A list of all your burning travel photography questions.


Nicole
+1.508.873.6387
www.nicoleconnolly.com

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Travel Photography Evening Workshop
